how_to.title: How to become an affiliate
how_to.description:
You just need to provide some basic data: Full name, Email, Phone number, Country of origin, create your access password and you'll quickly finish this part!

Wait for our team to get in touch: After submitting the form, one of our affiliate managers will contact you via WhatsApp or email. They will evaluate your profile and explain exactly how everything works.

Access to the affiliate platform: When your account is approved, you will be able to access the exclusive Dashboard panel. In it, you will find: Your Onabet / Esportes da Sorte affiliate link, Support materials, Real-time tracking of commissions and Direct support with the EDS team.
